articles.title: Spotify is rolling out the ability to stream music right from your Apple Watch - The Verge
articles.description: Spotify is rolling out the ability to stream music right from your Apple Watch. Once the new feature is rolled out to you, you’ll be able to stream music from Spotify on your Apple Watch to other Bluetooth devices when you’re not near your phone.
articles.content:
No iPhone needed
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
